subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Pacers’ D. J. Augustin had his strongest playoff game, scoring 16 points in Game 1 over the Knicks, and getting the better of Raymond Felton, who was his teammate in Charlotte three years ago.
snippet: The Pacers’ D. J. Augustin had his strongest playoff game, scoring 16 points in Game 1 over the Knicks, and getting the better of Raymond Felton, who was his teammate in Charlotte three years ago.
